Title: HTML - an introduction
Descrption: HTML stands for Hypertext Markup Language. This language is actually a type of standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications. In fact, HTML is considered the key element of web pages, and all programming languages for website design depend on HTML in some way. By using this language and CSS and JavaScript, the fundamental technologies for the global web network are formed. Browsers receive HTML documents from a web server or local repository and convert them into multimedia web pages. In fact, HTML defines the semantic structure of web pages and includes the appearance characteristics of the document. HTML elements are the building blocks of HTML pages. Using them, images and other objects such as interactive forms can be embedded in the created pages. This language provides a means to create structured documents by specifying structural meaning for text such as headings, paragraphs, lists, links, citations, and more. HTML can contain programs written in scripting languages such as JavaScript that affect the behavior and content of web pages. The use of CSS defines the appearance and layout of the content. The World Wide Web Consortium, which defines HTML and CSS standards, has recommended the use of CSS over plain HTML since 1997. HTML documents refer to a structure of nested HTML elements. These elements are specified in the document by HTML tags. A combination of different tags and text can be placed between the beginning and end tags. Some elements such as link break with br mark do not allow embedding any other content, text or tags. Various elements such as pictures, forms and tables can be placed in HTML pages, but in order for these elements to be understood by the browser, a certain code and tag must be used so that when the browser reaches the part specified for that element, it will be displayed on the pages.

Title: JavaScript - an introduction
Descrption: JavaScript, also called JS for short, is one of the most popular programming languages. JavaScript is a high-level, dynamic, object-oriented, and interpreted language that supports a variety of programming styles. This language can be used for programming (Server Side), mobile applications, games and desktop applications. Therefore, it can be considered that the JavaScript programming language is a versatile language. JavaScript is a popular language. This popularity is not without reason because with this object-oriented language you will be able to bring life to your soulless sites and interact with your users. That means you can display animation, audio and video files on your site. You can also put a timer on your site, change colors with mouse movement and many other things that make web pages more attractive. But that's not all JavaScript has to offer. You can start creating web, mobile and desktop applications using this language. For this purpose, you can use various JavaScript frameworks that provide you with a set of libraries. Another fun thing you can do with this language is to develop computer games under the browser.

Title: CSS - an introduction
Author: Eric A. Meyer & Estelle Weyl
Descrption: CSS markup language is actually a language for describing how to display website pages. If we consider a website like a building, HTML is the skeleton and overall structure of the site, and CSS includes the facade of the building, colors, wallpapers and all the parts related to the decoration and beautification of the building. Languages like ASP and PHP can also be likened to locks, safes, fire extinguishing systems and all things related to building smartness. Implementing many effects and charms of a web site or portal can be the best and most attractive part of working with CSS, of course, at the same time, JavaScript language also comes to the help of CSS and takes over the dynamics of pages, it can be said that the main nature of CSS language is to make changes It is in the appearance of the site, for example the appearance of an accordion menu, the colors and effects displayed in different parts of a website. The reason why this language is called CSS or Cascading Style Sheets is the way the codes of this language are executed. When writing CSS codes, web designers advance the codes from the whole except because the nature of this language is to overwrite or rewrite the codes of the lower lines on the codes in the higher lines in the form of a cascade. Also, in addition to the execution method, the same code can be applied simultaneously on different parts of the page. The concept of cascading of this language is more visible when an element on the page is styled several times. In this case, the last code that refers to that element will be overwritten and executed in a cascading manner on all related codes. In simple terms, we can also mean the term Cascading Style Sheets to style web pages in a cascading manner.

Title: Responsive design with Bootstrap
Author: Don Norman
Descrption: User experience, which is called UX for short, examines the concept of user experiences about using a specific product or service in a specialized way. If we want to express this definition a little more simply, we should say that UX is the effect or impact that remains in the user's mind. At first, it may seem that such a concept is only for the digital world and its products, but this is not the case; Because the user experience plays a prominent role in all the daily and most mundane tasks. For example, when you enter a sports complex or club, the behavior of different employees, the number of devices, comfort facilities, cost, quality of service and things like that have a significant impact on your experience and good feeling; So the experience and satisfaction of the user and customer is not only limited to digital services and products. The most important issue that businesses need to address today is designing a user-friendly strategy; That is, they should produce and supply products and services based on user needs. The way of presentation is very important. Digital products are not only limited to beautiful appearance and visual design; That is, visual beauty may be in the last priorities of a product. User experience provides rules for the type of functionality and usage of the product. Any digital product must be placed within this framework and rules to be successful and adapt to it. That is why a user experience designer, instead of paying attention to the appearance of the site, pays attention to how the site is used and makes every effort to design and present the user's path from the beginning to the end.
